title: Chouxiaoya Lixian Ji
synopsis: Ah Ni, a "robot duck" from the moon, was adopted by the mother duck of the prairie flying duck family by chance. Ah Ni firmly believes that like other ducklings, he is eager to spread his wings and fly. 　　 The super chip on Ah Ni's body has attracted lunar people to track. It turns out that Ah Ni is a super bomb used by evil scientists on the moon to destroy the earth's atmosphere. Under the chase of the coyotes, Ah Ni and his friends went south to reunite with the migrating ducks. Regardless of the danger of chip explosion, Ah Ni finally defeated the evil doctor and helped the ducks to reach the south victoriously by virtue of love and affection and bravery. 　　 And Ah Ni realized his dream: to grow into a real little flying duck. (translated from douban)
